data.text: Nɨghnɨzir aghuim, amizimɨn mɨn, uan dɨpenimɨn ingari.
Egha an asɨzim mɨsuegha dagheba isai, egha wain sara vereverezɨ, a isɨngi.
“Ia gumazir nɨghnɨzir aghuiba puvatɨziba ko gumazir onganiba,
Ia uan arazir onganiba atakigh, egh izɨ ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuim ini.
Nɨ gumazir uabɨ fa dɨbovir akabav geim akɨram, an akar kuram nɨ ikaragham.
Kamaghɨn, nɨ akaba batozir gumazim akɨran markɨ. A bar nɨn aghuagh nɨn apanim damuvɨra ikiam.
Nɨ gumazir nɨghnɨzir aghuim itim, akam a danɨngam, eghtɨ nɨghnɨzir aghuiba a gizɨv mangɨvɨra ikiam.
Nɨ nɨghnɨzir aghuim inisɨ, nɨ faragh Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn atiating an apengan ikɨ. God a bar deragha arazir kuratam an itir puvatɨ.
Nɨghnɨzir aghuim nɨ damutɨ nɨ dughiar ruarimɨn nguazimɨn ikɨva,
Nɨ nɨghnɨzir aghuim inigh, egh nɨ uabɨn akurvagham.
Ezɨ arazir onganim mati amizir mam pura ifaghata tintinibar tiarim akari.
Ezɨ an dɨpenim nguibamɨn tongɨra danganir pɨn itimɨn iti.
Egha gumazamizibar gari, me uan ingangariba bagha zui,
“Ia gumazir nɨghnɨzir aghuiba puvatɨziba ko gumazir onganiba,
Dɨpar nɨ okemeghamim, a bar isɨngigham.
Ezɨ gumazir an akam baraziba, me fozir puvatɨ, an dɨpenim mati oveaghuezibar dɨpenim.
